en-US.summary: This skill gets the WOD for Grassroots Crossfit from Beyond the Whiteboard.
examplePhrases: Alexa ask Grassroots what's the workout
Alexa ask Grassroots what's the wod
en-US.name: GRCF-WOD
en-US.description: This skill gets the WOD for Grassroots Crossfit from Beyond the Whiteboard. As of now it only gets the latest post, but we will add functionality to get any date.
